channel.title: Rstudio on Daniel Wing
channel.description: Recent content in Rstudio on Daniel Wing

item.title: GitHub and RStudio
item.description: Intro GitHub is a super resource that serves many pourposes. I use it to learn from other peopleâ€™s code, but also to store my public projects for free on the cloud (for private repos I use BitBucket). GitHub uses Git, a distributed version control, and it is very powerful to organize your info but also to manage changes and contributions with order instead the natural mess we usually come up with.

item.title: Blogdown 101
item.description: Intro I am not an expert on Blogdown nor Hugo, I am merely taking notes to myself and making them public for anyone to read in case they find them useful To go over the basic steps to get started with Blogdown and post a site online for free. Intro Prerequisites: You need RStudio and R installed in your computer in a different post I explain how to go over this.
